title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: Accessing a URL returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content when no webapps are deployed instead of returning an HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: The expected behavior is that when accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 v7.0.0beta release from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat instance
4. Observe that it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
